column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Went to JINYA with my family on a Saturday afternoon. Customer service was exceptional. They have this rule that they don't sit parties that aren't complete upon arrival. So
column2: we had to wait for like 10 minutes before we were seated
column3: but it was understandable. They have a lot of Ramen options in addition to build your own Ramen. I had the "Sprouting Up Ramen" which was so flavorful! The food came in quickly too. I definitely recommend this location for a some good Ramen in the city!
